column4: my pendrive is detected when using command SUDO FDISK -L but not display on desktop .
Are you a member of the group plugdev?
Well if you Â´ls -l /dev/sd*` you may find that the drive is in the plugdev group. You would then have to add yourself to that group to be able to use it.
Please note that you may need to log off and back in for the changes to take effect.
